body:
Originally reported at https://github.com/istio/istio/issues/20606

*Description*:

Envoy incorrectly translates HTTP/1.x `Host` header into HTTP/2 `:authority` header in HTTP responses (it's supposed to do that only in requests).

*Repro steps*:

Start proxy:
```
$ bazel-bin/source/exe/envoy-static -l trace -c /tmp/config.yaml
```
Start fake upstream:
```
$ nc -l -p 10001
```
Send HTTP/2 request:
```
$ nghttp -nv http://127.0.0.1:10000
```
Send fake response in the fake upstream:
```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Host: localhost
Content-Length: 0

```
Receive illegal response in the client:
```
[  2.243] [ERROR] Invalid HTTP header field was received: frame type: 1, stream: 13, name: [:authority], value: [localhost]
[  2.243] [INVALID; error=Invalid HTTP header field was received] recv HEADERS frame <length=70, flags=0x05, stream_id=13>
          ; END_STREAM | END_HEADERS
          (padlen=0)
          ; First response header
[  2.244] send RST_STREAM frame <length=4, flags=0x00, stream_id=13>
          (error_code=PROTOCOL_ERROR(0x01))
[  2.244] send GOAWAY frame <length=8, flags=0x00, stream_id=0>
          (last_stream_id=0, error_code=NO_ERROR(0x00), opaque_data(0)=[])
```

*Admin and Stats Output*:

N/A 

*Config*:

```
admin:
  access_log_path: /dev/null
  address:
    socket_address:
      protocol: TCP
      address: 127.0.0.1
      port_value: 9901
static_resources:
  listeners:
  - name: listener_0
    address:
      socket_address:
        protocol: TCP
        address: 0.0.0.0
        port_value: 10000
    filter_chains:
    - filters:
      - name: envoy.http_connection_manager
        typed_config:
          "@type": type.googleapis.com/envoy.config.filter.network.http_connection_manager.v2.HttpConnectionManager
          stat_prefix: ingress_http
          route_config:
            name: local_route
            virtual_hosts:
            - name: local_service
              domains: ["*"]
              routes:
              - match:
                  prefix: "/"
                route:
                  cluster: local_cluster
          http_filters:
          - name: envoy.router
  clusters:
  - name: local_cluster
    connect_timeout: 1s
    type: LOGICAL_DNS
    dns_lookup_family: V4_ONLY
    lb_policy: ROUND_ROBIN
    load_assignment:
      cluster_name: local_cluster
      endpoints:
      - lb_endpoints:
        - endpoint:
            address:
              socket_address:
                address: 127.0.0.1
                port_value: 10001
```
